keyTransformations.snake_case to camelCase: All column names converted from snake_case to camelCase
keyTransformations.UUID to Document ID: PostgreSQL UUIDs become Firestore document IDs
keyTransformations.Foreign Keys: Replaced with document references or embedded in parent documents
keyTransformations.Enums: Stored as string values with TypeScript type validation

securityRules.description: Firestore Security Rules equivalent to PostgreSQL RLS policies
